title: Shadow Queen
lyrics:
Hurt she left in a cramp
She had no strength left to fight
Oh she left me her shadow
Shadow queen, black with light

Lift me up in your beauty
Lift me up in your height
Show the way, the safe path to me
I'll take the lead, you'll be my guide

Watch her play with the wind
She hardly touches the ground
Wide awakens everything
Makes you gather around

Lift me up in your beauty
Lift me up in your height
Show the way, the safe path to me
I'll take the lead, you'll be my guide

title: Sleep Well Child
lyrics:
Sleep Well Child 

Will I
Can I 
Hold you for a while

Will I
Can I
Hold you

I can't give you answers
Nor images of what will come
But take this word from me
I'm everything you need

I am here
In your pain
In your fear
I

Sleep well, child
Sleep tight
Sleep well, child
Sleep tight

© Brown Feather Sparrow

title: Beautiful & More
lyrics:
Lay down now
Lay down your body in the sand
There's nothing more to lose, so lay down now

Let the tide flattering
Surround you wave by wave
And nurse you just for now forever

And I'd paint your face paint your face
Beautiful and more beside there where you lay
And I'd dance around where you rest
And pray God's presence there forever

Lay down now
Lay down now your strong, but weary hands
Your palms up to the splintered sunlight falling

And I'd paint your face paint your face
Beautiful and more beside there where you lay
And I'd dance around you where you rest
And pray God's presence there forever
And you would not care
To open up your eyes in fear
'Cause there would be none

And once again you would hear thoughts of you
Once again you would hear thoughts of you
Whispered in your ear

© Brown Feather Sparrow

title: Water
lyrics:
At the corner of the street a sudden drop
A dimness in my eyes
Darkness doesn't yet occur but still my feet 
Are too weak to go hide

Water give way under me
Master, save me
Watch the colors one by one
They give their thoughts
I watch them all go by
In between I lose my head and don't resist
I'm too weak to go hide

I have nothing left here but to give it all
Take my lips and make them speak your name
Lord, make your victory mine

title: Silence Is Golden
lyrics:
Silence Is Golden 

While the air is getting thinner
I look down to you my love
And pronounce the words
You whisper in my ears

The emotions that we shared
Even now that you're so sad
So intense, so real
Like a holy sacred seal

Then I back away from breathing life
Then I back away beyond the distant skies

Looking back to the times we spent
On dealing with ourselves
And our secret mysteries
On planet love
It makes the corners of my mouth curl
A simple answer to you smile
When gravity gives in
And lifts me up

Then I back away from breathing life
Then I back away beyond the distant skies
Then I back away

© Brown Feather Sparrow

title: Blanket
lyrics:
Blanket

Black night be a blanket over me
(Black night be the fresh quiet darkness)
Black quiet be a blanket over me
(Whispered moonlight shivering shadow trees)

There's no threat in you
(Lay your hands)
You're my father's closed eyes
(Upon my head)

Cast out fear

© Brown Feather Sparrow

title: Now That We're Undone
lyrics: Instrumental

title: A Box Of Spring
lyrics:
A Box Of Spring

Feel her eyes watch over me
Lead me as I grow
Let me play in the grass
Let me dance my world

I command their spirit unto thee

Come and sing your crazy songs
Let me sing along
Lift me high above your pose
Swing me 'round the world

I command their spirit unto thee

Grasp one glimpse of flower-shaped lights
Can I be your star?

© Brown Feather Sparrow

title: Puppet Player
lyrics:
Puppet Player

Hard words can not break
Can not be
Can not shatter
I am wise enough to discern
I've lost my sight, still I see
Throw myself unto my knees
I will fall, Oh God be here

Hard words be my lamp
Be my light
Be my prophet
Be God's precious teaching to me

In spite of tears floating free
In spite of screaming fear in me
I will fall
You better be right

Thin air, there is no life
(What you say is what I breathe)
Father, father do you hear me?
Am I still your daughter?

What you say is what I breathe
I can't praise your name here

Still I recognize my shepherd's voice
Peace is in his footsteps
I cry
Still my son is in your hands
You must give away now
I cry

© Brown Feather Sparrow
